EmailTemplate.description: This Template is used to notify that a new Currency Update is Required
EmailTemplate.name: AF_CurrencyUpdate
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: New currency file required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Super User
Its now time to Update the Currency File. Please email the latest currency file to :
Martin.O'connell@cognizant.com Reetha.joseph@cognizant.com Sairam.Gogula@cognizant.com
Agency Fees
